properties.entry: [DARK_GRAY]In order to watch video press the heart icon.
[BLACK]You have to watch video until its end
[BLACK]You may get extra life by watching/ [BLACK]short video.
[DARK_GRAY]Set size and position of the buttons:
Do you want to close the game ?
[BLACK]FIRST PART IS OPEN!/[FIREBRICK]Reward is five extra lives.
[DARK_GRAY]Get [FIREBRICK]FIVE[DARK_GRAY] lives and continue/ [DARK_GRAY]from the maze [TEAL]#%d[DARK_GRAY] where/ [DARK_GRAY]lives were over.
[TEAL]Skip current level and go to the /[TEAL]next one.
[DARK_GRAY]Get [FIREBRICK]TEN[DARK_GRAY] lives and continue/ [DARK_GRAY]from the maze [TEAL]#%d[DARK_GRAY] where/ [DARK_GRAY]lives were over.
[DARK_GRAY]Get [FIREBRICK]TWENTY[DARK_GRAY] lives and continue/ [DARK_GRAY]from the maze [TEAL]#%d[DARK_GRAY] where/ [DARK_GRAY]lives were over.
[DARK_GRAY]Opens [FIREBRICK]SECOND[DARK_GRAY] part of the game,/ [DARK_GRAY]mazes [TEAL]from I to XXVI.

The application does not collect and send private user data to third party persons and services./ [GRAY]The application uses the following services:/ [SKY]GooglePlayServices, AdMob, ADColony, Firebase Analytics, Fabric/ By using this application you are agreeing with privacy policy./ [GREEN]Please read the privacy policy.
